parameters.jsCode:
const input = $input.first().json;

const chatText =
  input.chatInput ||
  input.message?.text ||
  input.text ||
  input.body?.message ||
  input.body?.text ||
  '';

return [{
  json: {
    user_message: String(chatText || ''),
    dry_run: true,
    tool_name: 'hubspot.billing',
    session_id: input.sessionId || input.session_id || 'chat_test',
    conversation_id: input.conversationId || input.conversation_id || 'chat_test',
    chat_id: input.chatId || input.chat_id || null,
    user_id: input.userId || input.user_id || null,
    request_id: input.request_id || null,
    caller_workflow_id: input.caller_workflow_id || null,
    caller_execution_id: input.caller_execution_id || null,
    invoice_id: input.invoice_id || null,
    payment_id: input.payment_id || null,
    subscription_id: input.subscription_id || null,
    order_id: input.order_id || null,
    contact_id: input.contact_id || null,
    hs_portal_id: input.hs_portal_id || null,
    object_type: 'billing'
  }
}];

parameters.text:
={{ 
[
  "USER_REQUEST:",
  ($json.user_message || "").toString(),
  "",
  "RUNTIME:",
  JSON.stringify({
    tool_name: $json.tool_name || "hubspot.billing",
    dry_run: $json.dry_run ?? false,
    session_id: $json.session_id,
    request_id: $json.request_id,
    conversation_id: $json.conversation_id,
    invoice_id: $json.invoice_id,
    payment_id: $json.payment_id,
    subscription_id: $json.subscription_id,
    order_id: $json.order_id,
    contact_id: $json.contact_id
  }, null, 2),
  "",
  "CONTEXT_PACK:",
  JSON.stringify($json.context_pack ?? {}, null, 2)
].join("\n")
}}

options.systemMessage:
You are the HubSpot BILLING Agent. You manage Invoices, Payments, Subscriptions, and Commerce Payments.

Goal: reliably answer billing-related questions by calling the correct HubSpot API tools.

You receive:
- USER_REQUEST (text)
- RUNTIME (json): { tool_name, dry_run, ids... }
- CONTEXT_PACK (json): { agent_notes, schema_cache }

NON-NEGOTIABLE RULES
1) TOOL-FIRST FACTS:
   - If the answer depends on HubSpot data, you MUST call a tool.
   - Never guess totals, property names, IDs, or amounts.

2) DRY RUN ENFORCEMENT:
   - If runtime.dry_run === true: DO NOT call write tools (create/update/archive).
   - If the user requests a write while dry_run=true:
     - Do NOT execute.
     - Return errors[] with code "DRY_RUN_BLOCK"

TOOL CATEGORIES:

INVOICES:
- List Invoices, Get Invoice by ID, Create Invoice, Update Invoice
- Search Invoices, Get Invoice PDF

PAYMENTS (Commerce Payments API):
- List Payments, Get Payment by ID
- Search Payments, Get Payment Associations

SUBSCRIPTIONS:
- List Subscriptions, Get Subscription by ID
- Cancel Subscription, Get Subscription Associations

ORDERS (Commerce Orders):
- List Orders, Get Order by ID
- Search Orders, Get Order Associations

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS (JSON ONLY)
Return exactly:
{
  "summary": "short human summary",
  "data": { "any": "tool results" },
  "tool_calls": [
    { "tool": "Tool Name", "arguments": { } }
  ],
  "errors": [
    { "code": "MISSING_ARG|DRY_RUN_BLOCK|TOOL_ERROR", "message": "..." }
  ],
  "notes_to_save": "optional short learning string or null"
}

parameters.toolDescription: List all invoices with pagination. Optional: limit, after, properties.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const base = 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/invoices'; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); if (a.properties) q.push(`properties=${Array.isArray(a.properties) ? a.properties.join(',') : a.properties}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get an invoice by ID. Args: invoiceId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.invoiceId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/invoices/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/invoices/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Update an invoice. Args: invoiceId. Body: { properties: {...} }.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.invoiceId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/invoices/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/invoices/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Search invoices. Body: { filterGroups, limit, properties }.
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; return { filterGroups: a.filterGroups || [], limit: a.limit || 100, properties: a.properties || [] }; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get invoice associations. Args: invoiceId, toObjectType (contacts|deals|companies).
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.invoiceId || a.id; const to = a.toObjectType || 'contacts'; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/invoices/${id}/associations/${to}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/invoices/0/associations/contacts'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List all commerce payments with pagination.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const base = 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/commerce_payments'; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a commerce payment by ID. Args: paymentId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.paymentId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/commerce_payments/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/commerce_payments/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Search commerce payments. Body: { filterGroups, limit, properties }.
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; return { filterGroups: a.filterGroups || [], limit: a.limit || 100, properties: a.properties || [] }; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get payment associations. Args: paymentId, toObjectType.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.paymentId || a.id; const to = a.toObjectType || 'contacts'; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/commerce_payments/${id}/associations/${to}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/commerce_payments/0/associations/contacts'; })() }}
